Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Pulaski, Grand, then resume their normal route on Division due to street blockage near Division/Hamlin.

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Washington
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
